question: Which organisation unanimously adopted its first COVID-19-related resolution and demanded an end to hostilities around the world?
explanation:
The UN Security Council has unanimously adopted the first COVID-19-related resolution and demanded an end to hostilities around the world.
The resolution was drafted by France and Tunisia. The council was severely criticised for its failure to draft a resolution since the Covid-19 crisis. UNSCâ€™s two permanent veto-wielding members namely the US and China delayed its attempts to adopt a resolution.
